name: Mystic BBS Software

screenshots.caption: Mystic ANSI gallery.  ANSI template allows fully configurable directory navigation, lightbars, on-the-fly sauce processing, baud emulation, etc.  Taken from Piranha (ACiD WHQ)
Mystic 1.10 local/remote configuration (shown via Telnet).  It works via menu commands over terminals or locally!  Full pulldown ANSI interface with listboxes, wallpapers, etc
Mystic built in full screen ANSI editor.  ANSI template, lightbar quote window, cut/paste, message uploading, etc.  Taken from Sector 7

Standard file listing.  Long file name support, internal ZIP, RAR, LZH, ARJ file viewing.  Prev/Next page in standard listing, and a full screen file lister option too!  File rating and comment system in the works!  Taken from Clutch
Recent callers listing from Distortion BBS.  Check the dates!  Who says BBSes are dead?!
IRC-like full screen teleconference with built in 1000 line scrollback private messaging, emotes, and chat rooms.  Taken from Theoretically

short_description: Mystic BBS software is the continuation of the Mystic BBS software project originally developed for MS-DOS in the 1990's.  Today, it has been integrated with various Internet protocols and ported to multiple operating systems.
